
{{Server client function}}
This function sets the current [[/weather.md|weather]] to the given valid value. To change the weather gradually, see [[/setWeatherBlended.md|setWeatherBlended]].

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
bool setWeather ( int weatherID )
</syntaxhighlight>

===Required Arguments===
*'''weatherID''': The ID of new [[/weather.md|weather]]. Valid values are 0 to 255 inclusive.

===Returns===
Returns ''true'' if the weather was set succesfully, ''false'' if an invalid ''weatherID'' was specified.

==Example==
This example will change the weather to foggy.
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
setWeather ( 9 )
outputChatBox ( "Weather changed to foggy!" )
</syntaxhighlight>
